page.title: 03Tresillian Infant School
page.content: Between{1885}and{1905}the building was a blacksmiths workshop. The school opened in {1905. The children which attend the school are aged between {5}and {7}years old.They come from Tresillian and other surrounding hamlets.Twenty one children attend the school.They are taught by one teacher which is the Headmistress.There is one classroom and a kitchen in the school.They are taught:{ {maths,english,spellings}and{P.E.}The teacher and the ancilliary helpers are very concerned about the road because it is dangerous to the children because of the amount of traffic on it. When the children leave the infant school they will go to a primary school in Truro.
